name: Ormer
description:
Ormer is board game inspired by the abstract strategy game Abalone.

To reproduce a real board, there is no game logic here: you can do whatever you want, follow the official rules or yours.

If you never heard about the official rules, see this document.

Controls:

It's childish, you just need a mouse with 2 buttons.

  • left click to add,remove & drag balls
  • right click to orient view
Todos:

  • save layout of boards

  • add more than 2 players
